exercises.name: Knee Push-up
exercises.description: Push-up with knees on the ground. Great for beginners.
exercises.description_ru: Отжимания с опорой на колени. Отлично подходит для начинающих.

exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.description: Classic push-up with hands shoulder-width apart.
exercises.description_ru: Классические отжимания, руки на ширине плеч.

exercises.name: Diamond Push-up
exercises.description: Push-up with hands forming a diamond shape. Targets triceps.
exercises.description_ru: Отжимания с руками в форме ромба. Нагружает трицепсы.

exercises.name: Archer Push-up
exercises.description: Wide push-up shifting weight to one arm at a time.
exercises.description_ru: Широкие отжимания со смещением веса на одну руку.

exercises.name: One-Arm Push-up
exercises.description: Advanced push-up using only one arm.

exercises.name: Pike Push-up
exercises.description: Push-up with hips raised high. Targets shoulders.
exercises.description_ru: Отжимания с поднятыми бедрами. Нагружает плечи.

exercises.name: Bench Dips
exercises.description: Tricep dips using a bench or chair.

exercises.name: Negative Pull-up
exercises.description: Jump up and slowly lower yourself down.

exercises.name: Pull-up
exercises.description: Classic pull-up with overhand grip.

exercises.name: Wide Pull-up
exercises.description: Pull-up with hands wider than shoulders.

exercises.name: Chin-up
exercises.description: Pull-up with underhand (supinated) grip.

exercises.name: Inverted Row
exercises.description: Horizontal pull-up using a low bar.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Classic bodyweight squat.

exercises.name: Jump Squat
exercises.description: Explosive squat with a jump at the top.

exercises.name: Assisted Pistol Squat
exercises.description: One-leg squat with support for balance.
exercises.description_ru: Приседания на одной ноге с опорой для баланса.

exercises.name: Pistol Squat
exercises.description: Full one-leg squat without assistance.
exercises.description_ru: Полное приседание на одной ноге без опоры.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward into a lunge position.

exercises.name: Jump Lunges
exercises.description: Explosive lunges with alternating legs in the air.
exercises.description_ru: Взрывные выпады со сменой ног в прыжке.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.description: Rise up on your toes to work the calves.
exercises.description_ru: Подъемы на носки для икроножных мышц.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Basic abdominal crunch.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Raise legs while lying on your back.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.description: Raise legs while hanging from a bar.
exercises.description_ru: Подъемы ног в висе на перекладине.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Alternate bringing knees to chest in plank position.
exercises.description_ru: Поочередное подтягивание коленей к груди в планке.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.description: Alternating elbow-to-knee crunches.
exercises.description_ru: Скручивания с поочередным касанием локтя к колену.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a straight body position on forearms and toes.
exercises.description_ru: Удержание прямого положения тела на предплечьях и носках.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: Hold a sideways plank position.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.description: Hold a sitting position against a wall.

exercises.name: Hollow Body Hold
exercises.description: Lie on back, lift legs and shoulders off ground.
exercises.description_ru: Лежа на спине, оторвать ноги и плечи от земли.

exercises.name: L-Sit
exercises.description: Hold body off ground with legs extended in L shape.
exercises.description_ru: Удержание тела над полом с вытянутыми ногами в форме L.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Jump with legs spread and arms overhead.
exercises.description_ru: Прыжки с разведением рук и ног.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Full-body explosive exercise combining squat, push-up, and jump.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place lifting knees high.
exercises.description_ru: Бег на месте с высоким подниманием коленей.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: Jump onto an elevated surface.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Rotate arms in circles to warm up shoulders.
exercises.description_ru: Круговые движения руками для разминки плеч.

exercises.name: Leg Swings
exercises.description: Swing legs forward and backward.

exercises.name: Hip Circles
exercises.description: Rotate hips in circles.

exercises.name: Torso Twists
exercises.description: Rotate upper body left and right.
exercises.description_ru: Повороты верхней части тела влево и вправо.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: Stretch the back of your thighs.

exercises.name: Quad Stretch
exercises.description: Stretch the front of your thighs.

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Stretch your shoulder muscles.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: Relaxing stretch for back and shoulders.
exercises.description_ru: Расслабляющая растяжка для спины и плеч.
